fullText:
Ephemeral Stride

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, warlock, Shadow Walk class feature
Benefit: While you have concealment from your Shadow Walk, you can move through enemy-occupied spaces and are treated as insubstantial against opportunity attacks.

Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 133.
name: Ephemeral Stride
prerequisite: 21st level, warlock, Shadow Walk class feature
benefit: While you have concealment from your Shadow Walk, you can move through enemy-occupied spaces and are treated as insubstantial against opportunity attacks.
